dcterms:description: A dataset containing tweets in English and Spanish for the task of detecting hate speech against immigrants and women. The dataset includes training, development, and test sets with labels for hate speech detection, aggressiveness, and target classification.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2019 Task 5: Multilingual Detection of Hate Speech against Immigrants and Women in Twitter
